countOf(str, subStr) → {Number}

Returns the non-overlapping occurrences of subStr in str. If either str or subStr evaluates to false, then returns zero.
Parameters:
Name Type Description

subStr String The String to look for.

format(str, argumentsopt) → {String}

Return a String with {n} replaced with the n-th argument
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
str String The String to format
arguments Object <optional>
 All other arguments are substituted into the String
Source:
  • util/StringUtils.js, line 203
Returns:
The formatted String
Type
String
Example
var s = pc.string.format("Hello {0}", "world");
console.log(s); // Prints "Hello world"
